channel.title: Need a 12 hour aday hoster
channel.description:
i need a free hoster he gets co-owner im so tried of my friend not hosting he host like 3-4 hours aday and thats it. i need someone to host for me i dont no if these is in right spot or even aloud to ask this anymore i seen people do this befor.
please someone help me. pm me if i can do it. dont use my msn i wont be on.
